description.overview: Vitality represents your physical energy, stamina, and life force available for daily activities and bold action.
description.detailed: This meter tracks your core vitality by monitoring how Mars and the Sun in the sky interact with your natal Sun, Mars, and key houses (1st house = identity and physical body, 5th house = creative expression). When these planets form supportive aspects like trines and sextiles, you feel energized and capable. Challenging aspects like squares and oppositions can deplete energy or create resistance that requires more effort to push through. Saturn transits can temporarily drain reserves but build long-term stamina when worked with intentionally.

primary_planets.sun: Core life force and constitutional strength - powers your baseline energy levels
primary_planets.mars: Physical drive and action energy - determines how much push you have

secondary_planets.saturn: Can temporarily deplete reserves but builds long-term stamina when worked with
secondary_planets.jupiter: Expands energy and optimism when supportive

key_houses.1: Physical body and how you show up in the world
key_houses.5: Creative vitality and self-expression through action

aspect_weights.conjunction: Maximum impact - direct merging of energies
aspect_weights.opposition: High impact - tension requires energy management

interpretation_guidelines.tone: Direct and physical - talk about what their body can handle today
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_high: Emphasize windows for physical activity, bold action, tackling demanding tasks
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_challenging: Acknowledge obstacles but frame as manageable with strategy
avoid: Telling them to 'push through' when depleted

phrasing_examples.high_harmonious: Your physical energy is at its peak today - this is your window for intense workouts, demanding projects, or bold moves you've been planning.
phrasing_examples.moderate_mixed: You have solid stamina today but it's not limitless - pace yourself and take breaks between demanding tasks.
phrasing_examples.low_challenging: Your energy reserves are low today - honor that by conserving where you can and avoiding overcommitments.
